Articles.Content: Hi, I am looking for a Space Shuttle mod for .23.5, and I looked at Bob Fitch's vid on the Space Shuttle, and i thought "i want that!" So, I went to the disp. to get it, downloaded it, and i saw that it was a CONFIG file! does anyone know a link to that space shuttle? (I will like it also if it looks almost exactly like it.)
In some hour there will be 0.90 with stock STS, simply download it and put part file in .23.5
Why not update to the current version of KSP? That makes finding working mods much easier.

Why are you still in .23.5? .25 is out right now and you can make a mini shuttle with the parts from it! In addition to that the new Mk-3 space shuttle parts will be out with the next update which is imminent!
Moving this to General Addon Affairs, as that's where requests for mods should go

I believe he was using this one:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71360
Why not just update to .90? It just came out today, with Beta than Ever mk3 parts! <cough cough>
